title: 3 and Out - TNF Thriller; Legion of Russ; McVay/Goff Still Impressive; Stefon Diggs Drama; Week 5 Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - TNF Thriller; Legion of Russ; McVay/Goff Still Impressive; Stefon Diggs Drama; Week 5 Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff gives his take on the TNF nail biter win for the Seahawks over the Rams, how Russell Wilson continues to carry Seattle, and why he was impressed with Sean McVay and Jared Goff in a tough loss.. John also previews the slate of Week 5 games and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow him on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
